upgrade.0: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 12% and 48 respectively.
upgrade.1: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 15% and 60 respectively.
upgrade.2: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 18% and 72 respectively.
upgrade.3: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 21% and 84 respectively.
upgrade.4: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 24% and 96 respectively.

upgrade.0: 元素战技命中敌人或触发元素反应后的8秒内，攻击力提升12%，元素精通提升48点。
upgrade.1: 元素战技命中敌人或触发元素反应后的8秒内，攻击力提升15%，元素精通提升60点。
upgrade.2: 元素战技命中敌人或触发元素反应后的8秒内，攻击力提升18%，元素精通提升72点。
upgrade.3: 元素战技命中敌人或触发元素反应后的8秒内，攻击力提升21%，元素精通提升84点。
upgrade.4: 元素战技命中敌人或触发元素反应后的8秒内，攻击力提升24%，元素精通提升96点。

upgrade.0: 元素スキルが敵に命中する、または元素反応を起こした後の8秒間、攻撃力+12%、元素熟知+48。
upgrade.1: 元素スキルが敵に命中する、または元素反応を起こした後の8秒間、攻撃力+15%、元素熟知+60。
upgrade.2: 元素スキルが敵に命中する、または元素反応を起こした後の8秒間、攻撃力+18%、元素熟知+72。
upgrade.3: 元素スキルが敵に命中する、または元素反応を起こした後の8秒間、攻撃力+21%、元素熟知+84。
upgrade.4: 元素スキルが敵に命中する、または元素反応を起こした後の8秒間、攻撃力+24%、元素熟知+96。
